content.question: Which of the following statements about the integral <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <mrow> <msubsup> <mo>∫</mo> <mn>0</mn> <mi>π</mi> </msubsup> <mrow> <msup> <mrow> <mi>sec</mi></mrow> <mn>2</mn> </msup> </mrow> </mrow> </mstyle><mi>x</mi><mtext> </mtext><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qadaWdXaWdaeaapeGaci4CaiaacwgacaGGJbWdamaaCaaaleqabaWd biaaikdaaaaapaqaa8qacaaIWaaapaqaa8qacqaHapaCa0Gaey4kIi pakiaadIhacaqGGaGaamizaiaadIhaaaa@4269@ </annotation> </semantics> </math> is true?

choices.label: The integral diverges because <math> <semantics> <mrow> <munder> <mrow> <mi>lim</mi> </mrow> <mrow> <mi>x</mi> <mo>→</mo> <msup> <mrow> <mfrac> <mi>π</mi> <mn>2</mn> </mfrac> </mrow> <mo>−</mo> </msup> </mrow> </munder> <mi>tan</mi> <mi>x</mi> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4429@</annotation> </semantics> </math> does not exist.

The integral diverges because <math> <semantics> <mrow> <munder> <mrow> <mi>lim</mi></mrow> <mrow> <mi>x</mi><mo>→</mo><msup> <mrow> <mfrac> <mi>π</mi> <mn>2</mn> </mfrac> </mrow> <mo>−</mo> </msup> </mrow> </munder> <msup> <mrow> <mi>sec</mi></mrow> <mn>2</mn> </msup> <mi>x</mi></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaWaaCbeaeaaqa aaaaaaaaWdbiGacYgacaGGPbGaaiyBaaWcpaqaa8qacaWG4bGaeyOK H46aaSaaa8aabaWdbiabec8aWbWdaeaapeGaaGOmaaaapaWaaWbaaW qabeaapeGaeyOeI0caaaWcpaqabaGcpeGaci4CaiaacwgacaGGJbWd amaaCaaaleqabaWdbiaaikdaaaGcpaGaamiEaaaa@4544@ </annotation> </semantics> </math> does not exist.

content.answer: The integral diverges because <math> <semantics> <mrow> <munder> <mrow> <mi>lim</mi> </mrow> <mrow> <mi>x</mi> <mo>→</mo> <msup> <mrow> <mfrac> <mi>π</mi> <mn>2</mn> </mfrac> </mrow> <mo>−</mo> </msup> </mrow> </munder> <mi>tan</mi> <mi>x</mi> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4429@</annotation> </semantics> </math> does not exist.

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
